name: pigeon game (Delta2Force)
description:
Hello!

In this game you fly around as a pigeon while shooting other pigeons on the ground. The longer you survive, the harder it gets! Using the money earned from shooting the pigeons you can buy yourself goodies, such as better guns and healing items.

The controls are explained at the start of the game, but if you need them again, here you go: 

Attributions

This game was made using libGDX and Java.

Songs used: Stang by Gigakoops and Making Up for Lost Time by Origami Repetika.
